00033 class Duration

00037     long int durN;
00039     long int durD;

00050     // (i.e. dur * 3/2 or dur * 7/4)
00051

00053     Duration& operator -=( const Duration &dur );
00055     Duration& operator *=( const Duration &dur ); 
00056     Duration& operator /=( const Duration &dur );
00057     // (i.e. dur * 3/2 or dur * 7/4)
00058

00061     {return ! (*this < dur); };
00062         bool operator <( const Duration &dur );
00063     bool operator <=( const Duration &dur )
00064     {return ! (*this > dur); };
